name: Precious Edeki
title: Founder at Teeket
review: Working with Peter has been one of the highlights of building Teeket, he doesn’t just “do the work,” he brings ideas, color, and life into every feature he touches. He’s not just a developer; he’s a builder with heart.

name: Nimi Felix-Briggs
title: CEO at Echelon Trust
review: He is professional, communicative, and delivers exceptional quality on time. An outstanding partner for any digital project.
